lead_paragraph: LEUNG--Leo Y C, of Monkton, MD died on June 5, 2016 at the age of 82. Beloved husband of Margaret Y.Y. Leung; devoted father of Monica Leung, Magdalene Andersen, Maria Leung, Lester Leung and Leonard Leung. Visitation will be held at St. Ignatius Catholic Church, Forest Hill, MD on Wednesday, June 8, 2016 from 11am-12pm in the new church. A Mass of Christian Burial will follow at 12pm. Those who desire may make a contribution to St. Ignatius Catholic Church, 533 E. Jarrettsville Road, Forest Hill, MD 21050. Condolences may be left on the guestbook at mccomasfuneralhome.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEUNG, LEO Y C
